display_long_description:
🔸 Experience being a space spiderman

🔹 Single-player experience with marvelous replayability.

🔸 Unique adventure mixing action, combat & puzzles

🔹 VR experience for both casual & hardcore players, seeking a true challenge
[media]
🔸 Refined locomotion system - arcade-style controls provide great comfort in movement

🔹 Perfectly comfortable & intuitive - sitting, standing & roomscale modes

🔸 Enjoy realistic physics - throw, grab & manipulate

🔹 Plenty of unique enemies and obstacles to overcome
[media]
🔸 Equipment has 5 unique modes

🔹 Hours of content and gameplay

🔸 Content and gameplay updates

🔹 Explore and discover the mysteries of a huge space station
[media]
🔸 Get weapons to defend yourself from rogue robots

🔹 A unique challenge for anyone looking for an opportunity to jump, shoot and have fun

🔸 Varied environments and levels filled with details

🔹 Awesome characters and a rich story

🔸 Use the inventory system and always have the best gadget for every occasion

🔹 Made natively for Meta Quest 2 headset

Epic action-adventure is back. Yupitergrad 2 raises the stakes. Check out the refined movement and combat system, evade obstacles, and see what surprises the new space journey will bring. 
Taste new challenges, use new items & discover the secret of the abandoned base.
It's a mix of arcade, parkour, and puzzles, Metroidvania style. It's an experience that has never been deeply explored in VR before.
